Gensokyo:PerfectCherryBlossom.NAME: Perfect Cherry Blossom
Gensokyo:PerfectCherryBlossom.FLAVOR: A favor bestowed upon you for befriending a lonely girl.
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you would die, heal to #b10% of your Max HP instead. Whenever you would die, #rkill ALL enemies.

Gensokyo:Mercy.NAME: Mercy
Gensokyo:Mercy.FLAVOR: It is mercy, not justice or courage or even heroism, that alone can defeat evil.

Gensokyo:Justice.NAME: Justice
Gensokyo:Justice.FLAVOR: The dead cannot cry out for justice. It is a duty of the living to do so for them.

Gensokyo:CelestialsFlawlessClothing.NAME: Celestial's Flawless Clothing
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, heal to full HP and add an #rAvatar #rof #rDeath to the current encounter. Only works while in combat and will not trigger if an #rAvatar #rof #rDeath is already present.

Gensokyo:OccultBall.NAME: Occult Ball
Gensokyo:OccultBall.FLAVOR: It is said that if you collect seven of them, they would make your wildest dreams come true.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a random #yUrban #yLegend to your hand. Occasionally find more #yOccult #yBalls.
At the start of combat, choose #b1 of #b2 #yUrban #yLegends to add to your hand. Occasionally find more #yOccult #yBalls.
At the start of combat, choose #b1 of #b3 #yUrban #yLegends to add to your hand. Occasionally find more #yOccult #yBalls.
At the start of combat, add #b3 random upgraded #yUrban #yLegends to your hand.
